item.title: Best Student Poster at NetSci 2012
item.description:
The poster that Isaac Velando and I made for our project on quantifying the predictability of epidemics using shortest-path trees won Best Student Poster at the NetSci 2012 conference. The poster presents some early extensions of work that appears in my dissertation:

We received this sweet trophy, which congratulates us for writing an awesome paper, and which is shown off to great advantage against the parti-colored floor of my office.
